quote: History isn't all fact--it's just the story the victors tell to keep themselves in power. And it's been a slow revision. The more time passes, the easier it becomes to reinvent the past.
quote_letters: HISTORY ISNT ALL FACT--ITS JUST THE STORY THE VICTORS TELL TO KEEP THEMSELVES IN POWER AND ITS BEEN A SLOW REVISION THE MORE TIME PASSES THE EASIER IT BECOMES TO REINVENT THE PAST
